html:
Jan 7 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including ABN Amro Bank NV, Credit Agricole and Uniper SE, on Thursday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* ABN Amro Bank NV ABNd.AS: Credit Suisse cuts to underperform from neutral

* Credit Agricole CAGR.PA: Credit Suisse cuts to neutral from outperform

* Credit Suisse Group AG CSGN.S: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* Hargreaves Lansdown HRGV.L: Citigroup raises to neutral from sell

* Uniper SE UN01.DE: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Thursday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.
